m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      Directory:Xenotech Research From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search Page first featured July 4, 2009 Xenotech says their new modular Energy Pods will be available for home or business needs by around Dec. 2009. The small opening is for the focual point from a fresnel lens. See also Directory:Charles Shults' Fresnel Solar Design Xenotech Research, headed by Sir Charles Shults III, has several projects under way: 1) ramping up for manufacturing of an affordable, modular 500W Solar Po
